cropsloverain.midnightconfig.title: Crops Love Rain
cropsloverain.midnightconfig.chanceDescr: The chance describes a 1 out of x chance that a crop will grow extra each tick.
The chance describes a 1 out of x chance that a crop will grow extra each tick.
cropsloverain.midnightconfig.haltRegular:
Completely stops the vanilla growth mechanics for all supported crops.
Use to test whether plants are being grown by rain.

Does nothing if debug mode is disabled.
